title: [GAMEPLAY] Bandito Fiddlesticks Dance bug
body: When you go to dance while playing Bandito Fiddlesticks, your dance will pause at a random time and you will be stuck in that position until you move or cast. Not sure if this occurs on other skins or the default Fiddlesticks skin. Hope we can get to the bottom of this peculiar phenomenon.

replies.body: This is an intended feature in his passive where he turns into a spooky scarecrow.

This is not right as a Fiddlesticks main It makes him the only champ that can't dance. And {{champion:9}} just wants to dance on the corpses of his fallen foes...... PLZ riot fix it. I have many a thread and posts about the actual game play features that I feel it messes with aswell if you'd like to give it a read.
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/VVwkdfWE-fiddle-cant-dance
Fiddle is too spooky for dancing
This is actually working as intended! :D It's his his scarecrow idle pose!
